content: This chemical element has the symbol Au and was highly sought after during the 19th century Gold Rush. What is it?

Ah, you're referring to the element with the symbol Au. That would be gold, isn't it? I remember learning about the gold rush in history class. It was such a significant event in the 19th century, attracting thousands of people in search of fortune. It's fascinating how something as shiny as gold can have such a big impact on society.
